Name: احید
Meaning: He who takes to one side.

Name: عین الغر
Meaning: The chief of the chosen one.

Name: بالغ
Meaning: He who attains the elevated station.

Name: ھاشم
Meaning: The Destroyer, The Crusher of Evil

Name: مخصوص بالمجد
Meaning: Chosen to be on the right path.

Name: معراج
Meaning: The Place of Ascent, The Above
